document.id: City of Tampa, Fla., Ord. No. 2020-54
document.heading:
AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF TAMPA, FLORIDA, RELATING TO TOURISM MARKETING DISTRICTS; AMENDING THE CITY OF TAMPA CODE OF ORDINANCES; REVISING AND RESTATINGÂ· CHAPTER 24.5, SECTIONS 24.5-1 THROUGH 24.5-23 PROVIDING FINDINGS; MODIFYING THE DOWNTOWN/HISTORIC YBOR
TOURISM MARKETING DISTRICT; ESTABLISHING THE SERVICES TO BE PROVIDED WITHIN THE DISTRICT; PROVIDING FOR LEVY AND PROCESS FOR CO:CLECTION OF SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS TO FUND THE SERVICES PROVIDED WITHIN THE DISTRICT; PROVIDING AN ALTERNATIVE OR A UNIFORM METHOD FOR THE COLLECTION OF SUCH SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS; PROVIDING FOR A SEPARATE ACCOUNTING OF
FUNDS; PROVIDING FOR AMENDMENTS TO THIS ORDINANCE, THE COLLECTION OF 'SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS AND THE INCREASE IN SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS BEYOND THE MAXIMUM ERRORS AND OMISSIONS IN THE ASSESSMENT ROLL; PROVIDING FOR SEVERABILITY; PROVIDING FOR CODIFICATION; PROVIDING FOR AN EFFECTIVE DATE.
